summary: Two teenage boys try to help a tiny spherical alien get back to its mothership, while the army and a devious petty crook pursue the creature for its wonderful powers.
cast: Ben Buckton|Keith Jayne|Ron Pember|Marjorie Yates|Barry Jackson|Andrew Bradford|Derek Deadman|Frank Mills|Linda Robson|Leslie Schofield|Dudley Sutton
title: The Glitterball
